text: Lɨhavɨci Jisasɨ nulɨdɨ lamalɨfɨmalɨ. Lamalɨfɨdɨfɨŋ abamalɨ. Namɨlaŋ Asɨ dɨ ciaŋ vɨdɨvɨdɨŋ agadɨ lamalɨfɨlɨfɨ hɨsɨŋ kulaŋ agɨlasaŋ sikɨvica sɨbam migɨlɨkalaŋ uamalɨ. Nɨbɨlaŋ alaŋ nuken ibi hadi daŋ hɨnidalu aba hadi kɨlakɨla hutesɨ hutesɨ agɨladɨ lamadamaŋ hɨdahɨda saŋ lɨhɨdavi uamalɨ. Haman lɨdɨŋ aludɨ ibi mɨŋaiakaiakaŋ uaiaŋ hadi aba abavɨdɨ aba mutɨŋ sabɨlɨm hɨvɨ uuŋ hɨdahɨdavi uamalɨ.
